thread.title: Gas leak disrupts trains in Gloucestershire
thread.title_full: Gas leak disrupts trains in Gloucestershire | West Country (E) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Gas leak disrupts trains in Gloucestershire
text:
Service is suspended on Arriva Trains Wales, GWR and CrossCountry services between Cheltenham Spa and Gloucester due to a gas leak
A gas leak near the railway between Cheltenham Spa and Gloucester means that trains cannot run between these stations. The disruption is likely to continue until around 2pm.
Last updated Tue 29 Sep 2015 Travel Cheltenham Gloucester Gloucestershire
